User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:7.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/7.0.1
Build ID: 20110928134238

Steps to reproduce:

come into private ctrl+shift+p   
comr from private ctrl+shift+p
try to open new page: 
 a) press '+' sign
 b) file -> new tab
 c) ctrl+t

no one case works

comments.text:
Yeah, nightly development versions.
http://ftp.mozilla.org/pub/mozilla.org/firefox/nightly/latest-trunk/
Try the win32.zip version, extract somewhere and run, so you will not need to reinstall your existing version after the test.
